name: Bosco Redux
description:
20 increasingly difficult levels of top-down shoot'em-up goodness.  It's not quite bullet-hell, but it gets nasty.  Use a gamepad or controller if possible.

Controls

ControllerKeyboardMoveLeft joystick /
Directional pad
WASD keys
ShootA button /
Right trigger
SpacebarPauseStart button
P key

Extra ship awarded every 75000 points.

Enemy missiles increase in speed and maneuverability each level.  Enemy fire rates also increase over levels.  Some other notable difficulty increases:

  • Level 5 - Enemy bases launch fireballs
  • Level 11 - Enemy missiles aim to intercept; accuracy increases in later levels
  • Level 16 - Enemy base fire begins leading the player; accuracy increases in later levels

Credits:

  • Robot voice generated using VoiceGenerator.io  and VoiceChanger.io
  • All other sound effects from Pro Sound Collection by Gamemaster Audio
  • Explosion and other sprite sheet animations by Creepy Cat
  • Font: Orbitron by Matt McInerney
